testcase.name: TC1203_Employee should be able to edit customer info from Edit Page
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the home page and log in.................................passed Then User clicks on My Operations field.....................................passed Then User clicks on Manage Customers field..................................passed Given User clicks on Edit button on a customer..............................passed And User changes the FirstName..............................................passed And User changes the LastName...............................................passed And User changes the Email..................................................passed And User changes the MobilePhoneNumber......................................passed And User changes the ZipCode................................................passed And User changes the Address................................................passed And User clicks on Save Button..............................................passed Then verifies the success message...........................................passed
